content: @Mark Iantorno @James Agnew from confluence the link to the java validator is https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/releases/latest/download/validator_cli.jar . The new hapi-release has the validator_cli.jar not included and now above link does not work (404). Would it be possible to add validator_cli.jar when a hapi-release is done?
5.2.0 was not released using the pipelines. I'll do a next release asap to regenerate the latest link on github
in the meantime the jar can be downloaded from the previous release page. Sorry for any inconvenience this might cause.
